job.name: Kafka_Write_Message_To_Topic
job.description: This workflow writes a message to a given publish-subscribe Kafka topic (https://kafka.apache.org/).

task.name: Kafka_Write_Message_To_Topic
task.description: This task writes a message to a given publish-subscribe Kafka topic (https://kafka.apache.org/).

script.code:
## Initialize variables ZOOKEEPER=zookeeper:2181 KAFKA=localhost:9092 TOPIC=$variables_topic MESSAGE=$variables_message
## Check if the topic exists, otherwise create it. exists=$(/opt/kafka/bin/kafka-topics.sh --list --zookeeper $ZOOKEEPER | grep -w "$TOPIC")
if ! [ $exists == $TOPIC ]; then echo "Topic $TOPIC does not exist" exit 1 else /opt/kafka/bin/kafka-console-producer.sh --broker-list $KAFKA --topic $TOPIC <<< $MESSAGE fi
